name: Float UI
title: floatui.com
payoff: Ship fast with Tailwind UI components
shortDescription: Float UI provides a comprehensive suite of free and open-source Tailwind CSS UI components and templates designed to help developers build modern, responsive websites quickly. Whether you're a seasoned developer or a beginner, Float UI simplifies the web development process by offering ready-to-use components that can be easily integrated with popular JavaScript frameworks. Ideal for startups looking to launch their products with professional designs without the overhead of custom development.
cons: May not suit complex web applications
